alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 10:59AM EST until February 05 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Pennsylvania, including the following counties, in west central Pennsylvania, Butler. In western Pennsylvania, Beaver and Lawrence. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1059 AM EST, emergency management reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Zelienople. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
